website_summaries.verdict: Named for the company that makes it, Cranium challenges teams to use a variety of skills to reach the end.
pros: Great group game that gets every one involved
Uses art, trivia, and pop culture smarts to accomplish game tasks
cons: Comes in original and new versions
New version has a smaller board but not as many cards

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept, disappointed in the update
customer_reviews.text: This game has all the fun bits of popular party games that you know and love but has been updated for more pop culture references than the original. This update made it harder to play with my in-laws, or really anyone over the age of about 50 as the clues were geared to a much younger generation. I loved the original, and it is still a great game, just wish I had purchased a non-updated version.
customer_reviews.author: Enailia

customer_reviews.title: I would return it if I could...not the original.
customer_reviews.text: Well it was very inexpensive it is very tiny and we had to use my magnifying glasses to read the cards. Game board is tiny too. The clues a ridiculously harder than the original game. I would return it if I could but we played with it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: ckselbe

customer_reviews.title: New version no good.
customer_reviews.text: They revised this game's questions from the original version and I do not like it at all. Also the new board is too small.
customer_reviews.author: nnj925

customer_reviews.title: Old Version Better for 40+
customer_reviews.text: We had this game when I was a teen, so I decided to buy a copy for a party. The new version is definitely for the 16-30 age range. My guests and I had no idea who many of the celebrities were and didn't know most of the songs. I'm going to look for an older copy.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Stupidly difficult trivia questions, stuff literally no one would know
customer_reviews.text: I played this game with my family as a kid and remember loving it. (I’m 39 now) I bought this one to play and the updated trivia cards are unimaginably difficult. We read through several and they were all ridiculous. We did not play it and went back to Pictionary. I’m not sure what I’m going to do with this since I have no use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Crani"d"um....
customer_reviews.text: Someone stole this game name....I should have known, $15 sounded too good a price. The original game is worth 2-3 times the price, spend it. Half the cards have ridiculous questions/answers. Just randomly picked one; Silently draw the answer...hint is Expression...ok, fun-NO...answer you need to silently draw....Gym, Tan, Laundry. Seriously, WTH! Someone was playing a drinking game when they created this version. Ours may become a drinking game. While isolating with the fam (whom I love) during CV-19 drama you may want to keep the frustration level to a minimum, this version is not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: bes

customer_reviews.title: Updated Version
customer_reviews.text: We received the C1939 version of the Cranium game and have been enjoying it. It is a little different to the other versions we have played. The board is smaller, there is no fast track and the questions are updated with lots of questions on recent music, movies & books. The version says that it is for 16+ which is probably pretty accurate. My younger children play but have a hard time knowing a lot of the expressions/people/music that is listed on the cards. Overall it is a good game, just not exactly what we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: tinmantholen1

customer_reviews.title: Not like the old days.
customer_reviews.text: This 2016 edition is cheaper quality. Old sets used to come with boxes so the cards would stand up but now you leave it in the up and you could draw from them but now you have to stand them up in the box. The board is also smaller and flimsier.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Game board is really small no timer included but it is a fun game
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this game before and the game board is alot larger this is like 1/4th the size of the one I had. Its definitely the "quicker" game play version. No timer included in the box which is needed for game play. I just thought for the price it was going to be the normal game board and have all the things included. Other then that it came with the 4 boxes of questions which were a little more current because mine is so old, the clay, player board pieces, and the game board. I must say though this game is a blast to play in teams. Laughs and a lot of fun the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: ashley welch

customer_reviews.title: Our kids could play this for hours. Much shorter ...
customer_reviews.text: Our kids could play this for hours. Much shorter version than the original game from about 10 years ago. The cards are up to date so kids know the people/songs the questions are asking.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C

customer_reviews.title: Not the same game anymore - Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. This is not what I expected. Apparently they changed the game and it is WAY more difficult. Yes, it has more up-to-date song questions but the trivia etc is impossible. The "hints" actually lead you down the wrong path. Everything is smaller and chintzier. Will be returning and buying the original version on eBay.
customer_reviews.author: acorn

customer_reviews.title: It's CRANIUM... Turn off the TV and play this game!
customer_reviews.text: CRANIUM... This game is a blast - fun and challenging! Perfect for game night when you want something a little different. There are some cheaper knock-offs floating around here and elsewhere, but this item was/is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. T

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Used to play this for family game night and now I bought it as an adult to play with friends. Total hit!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Fun for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Great game to play with the family and all ages have a good time. Highly recommend this. The only thing I would like is if they sold an extra card set so we could keep reusing the board game after the cards are out. However the cards last 10+ games.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Karsting

customer_reviews.title: A great classroom resource for testing season.
customer_reviews.text: Creativity is at the core of the common-core. This game helps students to be creative and demonstrate understanding. It requires them to engage their multiple intelligences, and competencies while having fun.
customer_reviews.author: B.C

customer_reviews.title: Has something for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect game for game night with a group of family or friends. It has a little bit of everything for everyone. It's as of you bought 4 games for the price of 1. There are plenty of cards so you don't really need to worry about repeating questions for some time. The only complaint I have is that the board is small compared to other versions of Cranium I've seen so the game play is shorter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: As part of a group who .eets monthly to play board games, Cranium allows us multiple ways to entertain ourselves. It requires creativity and artistic skills which vary in each of us. That creates additional entertainment value! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Corsair174

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun for the whole family. Also, ordering here is the best value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: CathrineES

customer_reviews.title: F-O-U-R Games in One equals a good time for A-L-L!
customer_reviews.text: This is an all time party game for all ages!! We can spend hours playing Crainium...and do! It pays for itself in all of the laughs and great times shared with one another. I especially love the charade aspect as it can be a belly buster to watch someone trying to act out. Where else can you get 4 games in one box for so little of a price? You certainly cannot put a price on fun times with friends and shared laughter!!
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game!
customer_reviews.text: great to play with family or friends and different than most other group board games
customer_reviews.author: Leah B.

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to play with couples and it was just boring... we are in our late 20s so maybe that played a role? I'm not sure... it was a good quality game but maybe we just aren't into this type of game.
customer_reviews.author: hewlew

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun! Had a blast with my kids, 6 and 9. Also enjoyed playing with my 3 and 5 year old nephews and my 7 year old niece.
customer_reviews.author: Haley C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: Cranium has always been a favorite of mine. Some of the questions are tough for kids but the board is a great size and makes for a fun game that doesn’t take more than 30-45 minutes when we play.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for families
customer_reviews.text: A fun game for kids or family game night! My family and I play this at every game night and it’s always a favorite
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: This is not the original game
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaper version of the original. The board is lame and the box and housing for the cards is extremely flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever
customer_reviews.text: I used to play this with a few of my friends years ago and remembering we had so much fun. I decided to get it again to play with my family over 10 years later. It is what it says it is, all games rolled into one and then some. You won't be disappointed. A Lot of laughs. D.S.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: One of the most fun games out there. Such a variety of things to do. This game really keeps kids engaged for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Averil Whiteford

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Great variety of trivia, acting and drawing. So happy to finally have one of our own!
customer_reviews.author: Anna P.

customer_reviews.title: Ready for confusion?
customer_reviews.text: Played for the first time for all of us with a group of diverse friends. We found it confusing, disoriented, and hard to find any point of interest. We stopped playing after about half an hour of being bored and not relating to the point of the game. (We understood the point, just didn't find it interesting to pursue.)
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this game. We play it every time we have guests or family over. It's really fun and very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had me in tears
customer_reviews.text: This game had us in tears. I was laughing my friends could not stop haveing such a good tome. It is sooooo fun. The game is quick enough but still gets competitive. Plus all the cards seemed really relevant idk I love the game a great addition to any game night list
customer_reviews.author: Andres Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Having a BLAST!!!
customer_reviews.text: My family has a blast playing this no matter how old you are it is so worth playing... it will be one of our board games we play every holiday and even on weekends...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a family vacation, Great to play with family, had a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Best party game or “ice breaker” game.
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the whole family. Never same game twice. Awesome gift for kid going off to college wanting to find a way to break the ice with fellow freshmen.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fain

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this. Get older version
customer_reviews.text: This version of the game is full of awfauk questions, weird character and lame stuff. If you can buy older version.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo López

customer_reviews.title: Put down the cell phone night.
customer_reviews.text: Recived 3, gave as gifts. Nice family night game or drinking game for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game
customer_reviews.text: My whole family have a lot of fun with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom

customer_reviews.title: Family game night was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Family game night was lots of fun with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: A well rounded game
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun for the whole family. The various categories make it great when trivia or geography isn't your forte. The art, word and music puzzles are particularly fun. This game might be too difficult for younger kids though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.B

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game For Friends & Family
customer_reviews.text: Good with groups and teams too. Involved combines lots of play elements!
customer_reviews.author: David Khachadoorian

customer_reviews.title: Multi Skilled game for a group
customer_reviews.text: Great game to play if you want to challenge your art, trivia, acting, and brain skills. Fun game for a group of friends to spend an hour on
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stegenga

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fun and Intelligent/Critical thinking
customer_reviews.text: Great fun game to play with family or friends and have a few drinks where you have to communicate and use critical thinking skills that most games do not make you use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Fort Worth

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game that incorporates some all time classics like charades, Pictionary, and trivia! Love the clay molding feature too!
customer_reviews.author: AshFerg 1

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults! Recommend to kill quarantine boredom!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for kids and adults. We laughed a lot and it helped ease some tensions during this quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: massagemama

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my son-in-law. He had ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son-in-law. He had this game, but it was lost during a recent move. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Geared to older people
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. But definitely hard to play with children.
customer_reviews.author: CeeAra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family game night
customer_reviews.text: If you've never played, you are missing out. It's great for kids (8+), teens, adults.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel James

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great game for the whole family have a wonderful time
customer_reviews.author: antonio tirado

customer_reviews.title: Missing cards
customer_reviews.text: I was missing a stack of cards but customer support was great and sent me replacement. I love this game it's a great way to have fun with your family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: Fun family game, gave it as a gift and they have enjoyed it
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, but the board could be better. Cards are quite difficult, but overall a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Live this game
customer_reviews.text: Zelpuz!!!! Watching your parents marionette each other is totally worth it. Funnest board game ever
customer_reviews.author: joseph r gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun family game for all ages! Our youngest player was 11 years old.
customer_reviews.author: FNU LNU

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever. Very interactive and challenging...causes lots of family arguments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Both the top and bottom boxes were ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun time with the family
customer_reviews.text: fun game , keeps the family entertained. A must have for rainy days
customer_reviews.author: tr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still my favorite game. Always fun with family,all ages can contribute
customer_reviews.author: zoompj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like how this game gets you to think enjoy family nights playing it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M.

customer_reviews.title: The questions are too hard
customer_reviews.text: We were excited about the game, but it turned out the game is not the best for us.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!! We love playing
customer_reviews.text: Great game we play when we have other couples over. Something different and competitive that you can use your brain for. Lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: super fun game for a group of people to play
customer_reviews.text: super fun game for a group of people to play. Can be challenging depending on a person's strengths/weaknesses, but that's one of the best things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Huggy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Box was dented and game board was damaged—-have to keep it because I need it this week for a group that I run and don’t have time to wait for another one
customer_reviews.author: Mulder83

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The board isnt the typical size of the Cranium board.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Walters

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Fun Gabe
customer_reviews.text: Great updated game. Current game fit those looking to entertain multiple generations
customer_reviews.author: TeriAnn New

customer_reviews.title: Team game
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really fun team game. Perfect for a couple’s game night.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Played with 3 adults and a 13 year old - the 13 year old schooled us all!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Best board game ever!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome party game! Been a favorite for years, a category for all, and for all a fun time :) Check the expansion packs if you finish the cards.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We've had tons of fun as a family playing this game!
customer_reviews.author: MaddieP123

customer_reviews.title: fun, however
customer_reviews.text: this is a newer version of Cranium, and if you are older than 30, you might not know all the questions. fun, however.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We love Cranium and have for years. Came in perfect. Brand new, including the clay.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick's Baby Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: So fun! Hard to play at parties when drinking is involved.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun family game. As an adult some of the newer questions I struggle with and my girls love that. They actually want to have game night and put the cell phones down. I would give an extra star if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Competitive? Great team building game!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game! Priced way better here than in the store!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

product_meta.title: Cranium Game
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Cranium Game is outrageous fun and gives players a chance to show off their talents! Players team up to cruise around the board completing activities in 4 color-coded categories: Creative Cat, Data Head, Star Performer, and Word Worm. One team picks a card from the category that matches their space on the board, and must successfully complete the activity before time runs out. Spelling a word backwards, drawing with their eyes closed, and solving a puzzle are just of few of the activities they might do. The first team to reach the Cranium Central space and complete one last challenge wins! Cranium and all related trademarks of Cranium, Inc. Copyright 2016 Cranium. Hasbro Gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Players can show off their talents
Move around the board completing activities in 4 fun categories
Featuring word play, sketching, sleuthing, acting, and more
Includes 600 cards, 4 movers, Cranium Clay, timer, die, 1 notepad, and instructions

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
